str2: Elijah, the prophet. Of Hebrew origin; Helias, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
From homoios and the alternate of pascho; similarly affected.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From proseuchomai; prayer; by implication, an oratory.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
To moisten, rain, send rain. A primary verb; to moisten.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To moisten, rain, send rain. A primary verb; to moisten.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A year, cycle of time. Prolongation from a primary enos; a year.
